title: Understanding Buen Muerte
text: Consider the cultural significance of dying at home surrounded by loved ones in Mexican American traditions.

title: Cultural Context
text: Think about how different cultures view the process of dying and the importance of family presence.

title: Defining Buen Muerte
text: What does 'buen muerte' translate to in English?
choices: good death, which emphasizes the role of religion at death

hintAnswer: emphasizes dying at home surrounded by family
title: Characteristics of Buen Muerte
text: What are the key characteristics of a 'buen muerte'?
choices: emphasizes dying at home surrounded by family
emphasizes the role of religion at death
